content.raw:
Apparently [all the sensors check the always_on tag](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/168c59bda570fcf5b37bff84808957cff0ffb095/gazebo/sensors/Sensor.cc?at=default#cl-109), and its [default value is off](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/src/38faacb054141c1825026f00b99797dcb17e5301/sdf/1.5/sensor.sdf?at=default#cl-28).

I don't know why. At a minimum, we should document the importance of this tag. Furthermore, feel free to create an issue to change the default value of `always_on` if you are so inclined.
content.html:
Apparently all the sensors check the always_on tag, and its default value is off.

I don't know why. At a minimum, we should document the importance of this tag. Furthermore, feel free to create an issue to change the default value of always_on if you are so inclined.
